body:
@kabum please retest, i think it is a problem related to the image viewer who uses file_get_contents but this should be now fixed. did you try to download the file?   
@schiesbn text editor problems should also be fixed.
sorry: a file "test.txt.v1369911916" appeared. is this concerned with versioning. calling @karlitschek
@kabum the log spamming is files_external related.
@kabum thx for testing found a bug related to your file "test.txt.v1369911916", may you can give it a try again.

:+1:

tested following (just dropbox):
each via webdav and web interface:
- upload a pdf, image and text file
- all are encrypted (unreadable) on dropbox
- modified the text file
- updated content on dropbox
- all are readable through owncloud

but it isn't performant (2 minutes to upload 3 files with a total size of 270 kilobytes) my specs: 100 mbit up/down, idling server ... weird
concerning performance: also with the enc app disabled everything on the external storage is slow. you're lucky - not your department ;)
